name: Reverse (Anna 'Anaka' Jenelius)
description:
Your name is Nick Jackson, and tonight you are going to a party to mingle with other people from the games industry. On your phone, you have the first prototype for Reverse - a game you are making.
Maybe you will be able to get some feedback on it from more experienced game developers - or even get an investor, if you are really lucky...

In this interactive story, you might experience a feeling of not really belonging in the group you are in. There is no winning or losing, just like in real life.
